tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Proficient and caring.  It was in July '20 in the Unlock phase but lot of Doctors were not operating. My wisdom teeth had a very bad infection. I booked an online consultation. The pain was unbearable and pain killers were not working. Dr. Sumana told me to get a Dental X-Ray done. The infection was bad and had hit the canal. She told me it had to be extracted. She also informed me that since the infection has reached the canal post surgery might feel numbness around the operated area which is called paresthesia. If that happens can be treated medically. It did concern me a little but I had to go for the surgery. Post surgery the numbness was there for a couple of months but with continuous medication it vanished. During the whole time she kept checking on my condition. Two thumbs up from my end.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kar's clinic is very conveniently located in Marol and easy to access. I had gone for a regular dental check and cleaning. There was barely any waiting as i had a scheduled appointment. The registration was quick and simple and the procedure started pretty much instantly. Its very neat and clean clinic i must say. Unlike so many other dentists looking at making a quick buck or two, Dr Kar took the time to see through and clean. There were no attempts to sell products or additional services. Highly recommended.

tags: None

review: I got treated for tooth ache at Dentalfit. I had been suffering from it for a while. I was finally relieved from it. Thanks to the Doctor. I had tried consulting others too but must say their treatment is effective. The staff is very warm and welcoming. The place also gives you happy vibes. Much needed by patients in agony. I would definitely recommend it to my friends.

review: I took my father in law who is 80 years old to this young dentist and was amazed to see how clearly and easily she explained the issue to him, making him comfortable as well as why he should be going ahead with the treatment. He got his tooth removed and root canal done, he was suggested on how to take care of it and I left with a very happy customer. I recommend this doctor.
